text: Chromolaena sinuata (wavyleaf thoroughwort) is a Caribbean species of flowering shrub in the sunflower family. It is found on the Islands of Cuba, Hispaniola, Puerto Rico, Guadeloupe, Martinique, La Desirade, Montserrat, St. Eustatius, and Antigua.Tropicos, specimen listing for Chromolaena sinuata (Lam.) R.M. King & H. Rob. Lamarck, Jean Baptiste Antoine Pierre de Monnet de 1788. Encyclopédie Méthodique, Botanique 2: 407-408 diagnosis in Latin, description and commentary in FrenchPlants of the Eastern Caribbean, Chromolaena sinuata (Lam.) King & H.E. title: Chromolaena sinuata
